001package imagingbook.common.util;
002
003import java.lang.reflect.Field;
004import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006import java.util.List;
007
008/**
009 * Defines static methods for making a shallow copy of any object.
010 * @author WB
011 *
012 */
013public abstract class CopyObjects {
014        
015        private CopyObjects() {
016        }
017        
018        // https://stackoverflow.com/a/26000025
019        
020        /**
021         * Returns a shallow copy of the given object using reflection.
022         * This can be used if the {@link Cloneable} interface is not 
023         * (or cannot be) implemented.
024         * 
025         * @param <T> generic type
026         * @param entity the object to be copied
027         * @return the object copy
028         */
029        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
030        public static <T> T copy(T entity) {
031            Class<?> clazz = entity.getClass();
032//          T newEntity = (T) entity.getClass().newInstance();
033            T newEntity = null;
034                try {
035                        newEntity = (T) entity.getClass().getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance();
036                } catch (InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException | IllegalArgumentException | InvocationTargetException
037                                | NoSuchMethodException | SecurityException e) { }
038
039            while (clazz != null) {
040                copyFields(entity, newEntity, clazz);
041                clazz = clazz.getSuperclass();
042            }
043
044            return newEntity;
045        }
046
047        private static <T> T copyFields(T entity, T newEntity, Class<?> clazz) {
048            List<Field> fields = new ArrayList<>();
049            for (Field field : clazz.getDeclaredFields()) {
050                fields.add(field);
051            }
052            for (Field field : fields) {
053                field.setAccessible(true);
054                try {
055                                field.set(newEntity, field.get(entity));
056                        } catch (IllegalArgumentException | IllegalAccessException e) { }
057            }
058            return newEntity;
059        }
060
061}
